title: Victorybit1
author: Victorybit1
content: I've you ever been in a situation wey you deyÂ  think which business to do with money wey just enter your hand?Like better money enter your hand but you don't know what business to do with it.I want to tell you all 4 correct businesses wey you fit use am do wey go yield better profit at the end.1: Fish farming or Poultry farming: The demand for food product na constant thing. AsÂ  the population dey grow na so the demand for food tooÂ  they increase. You can start with a plastic tank or tarpaulin for the fish farming. You can also rent ponds from people. There are people that have ponds they rent out for fish farming purpose . The profit in fish farming is huge. Na my parent business be this so I know what they make from it.2: Mobile money AKA POS business: money dey for pos business, no look am say e no dey. Just get a good location and the placeÂ  busy. Pos business provides convenience to a lot of people that don't want go through bank hassle.Â  I am among the first people who started the POS business before it became a global thing ðŸ˜ƒ. I made a lot of money, and I am still doing it.3: online business( E-commerce) With the increase social media engagement, starting online store by selling various products is very lucrative. You fit sell shoes, clothes or anyone of your choice. The reason I love this one, you don't need to rent a physical store, people go dey see your product online. Just make sure say your product are of good qualities and deliver to your customer on time. 4: Buy properties people can rent from you like canopies, chairs, table, curtains, costumes etc. You can be renting these properties out to people that have parties or occasion and be making your cool cash. You know say party na sure thing, whether na birthday, wedding ceremony and even burial. People will need all these for the party. All these businesses are lucrative in Nigeria, However the success of any business requires careful planning, market research and commitment. If you have other businesses, you can also drop them here so we can see as well.

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: Among all that you mentioned above, it is only POS that is a business that has less stress. All you need to get use pako knack your small POS bot or if you have funds, you can rent a shop. There is a guy in my neighbourhood, this is the business that he is into and he is making it. Infact some people don't all that waste of money, only an umbrella with two plastic chairs and your POS machine, you are good to start making profit.The best is, if your location is in a very busy area, with high transactions, like markets or busy bus stop e.t.c. Before you know it yopu have made millions. The cashless policy real wrecked some POS operators then and kicked them out of the business but the serious ones that are making profit are still cashing out daily from it. I like it because it doesn't need much calculation and stress.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: I think fish farming and poultry, renting of chairs and canopy business, and online business is more intuned to succeed in the current economic state of the country, compared to P.O.S these days. Almost every business, small retail or wholesalers have P.O.S terminal to ease customers payments and burden of carrying large cash around. Even private individuals now carry P.O.S around.For rentage, a good location or environment that is prone to weekend gyrating and partying would be a good idea. Better still, a more populated place would have more appeal to such kind of business. For fishery and poultry farming, food is a necessity and I don't think people have stopped or will stop enjoying a good fish or poultry dish anytime soon.

comments.author: Antotena
comments.body: Running a business in nigeria is hard in today regime. If you have been there and still hanging around, you will understand how heat of maintaining a business has become and if you are new, the chances of making it will be low because newbie cannot survive with economic hardship. It's easy to start a business but maintenance and running cost is the problem in this country.Quote from: Victorybit1 on September 14, 2023, 10:40:33 AMI've you ever been in a situation wey you deyÂ  think which business to do with money wey just enter your hand?Like better money enter your hand but you don't know what business to do with it.I want to tell you all 4 correct businesses wey you fit use am do wey go yield better profit at the end.1: Fish farming or Poultry farming: The demand for food product na constant thing. There are people that have ponds they rent out for fish farming purpose . The profit in fish farming is huge. Na my parent business be this so I know what they make from it.There is something about fish farming you need to know and the main people who run them will not tell you. Fish business is of two types, there are people that goes into rearing fingalings, feed them until they reach the target kg before they are out for sale which you just explaind but the loss you will encounter in this one is deadly especially if you are not expert or have experience. Sometimes is not about the fish having sickness, there is high rate of cannibalism in fishing farming where the fish eat there self. They do that a lot when they found others are sick, they eat them in less than 24 hours before you come for check up and some also die naturally.Instead of buying fingerlings from scratch and rear, it's better you go into hatching business. This is where you have your own fish pond, mate the male sperms with the female eggs and they produce fingerlings after some days. You can sell them to people who buy to feed until maturity. The loss been a hatcher is far minimum than the fish farming itself and it's more lucrative without doing much. Think twice before you venture into fish farming my brother.Quote2: Mobile money AKA POS business: money dey for pos business, no look am say e no dey. Just get a good location and the placeÂ  busy. Pos business provides convenience to a lot of people that don't want go through bank hassle.Â  I am among the first people who started the POS business before it became a global thing ðŸ˜ƒ. I made a lot of money, and I am still doing it.The first challenge of this business is that it's already saturated, meaning you will make less profits if you are starting in a new location but if you have a busy area and no any available, you may make more profit but it's rare these that you will pass through any street or corner without seeing a POS business.Another challenge with this one is that you will likely get scam by some people if you are not smart ahead of them, you need to have 3 eyes to succeed in POS business because there are possibilities of collecting fake cash deposit, fake transfer, fake alert and even getting rob if your location isn't secure area.Quote3: online business( E-commerce) With the increase social media engagement, starting online store by selling various products is very lucrative. You fit sell shoes, clothes or anyone of your choice. The reason I love this one, you don't need to rent a physical store, people go dey see your product online. Just make sure say your product are of good qualities and deliver to your customer on time. Online business no dy work for Naija, you should said drop shipping instead. Drop shipping is buying stuff from e-commerce and then bring them to Nigeria to sell. Many of the vendors we have on Instagram, whatsapp, Snapchat and tiktok are into drop shipping and they make money from them.
